name: FanBridge, Inc.
description: Developer of a fan relationship management platform designed to manage fan acquisition, retention and engagement. The company's fan relationship management platform merges e-mails, social networking platforms and other digital media channels with direct-to-fan engagement tools, enabling artists, brands and other influencers to grow, engage and monetize their consumer fan bases.
one_liner: Developer of a fan relationship management platform designed to manage fan acquisition, retention and engagement. The company's fan relationship management platform merges e-mails, social networking platforms and other digital media channels with direct-to-fan engagement tools, enabling artists, brands and other influencers to grow, engage and monetize their consumer fan bases.
